unnormalised: Blueline Courier, a popular delivery service in Delhi, is facing severe delays in several areas due to the recent monsoon. Specifically, deliveries to areas like Sector 15, Noida, UP, 201301 and Old Delhi, near Jama Masjid, 110006, are experiencing 2-3 day postponements. The company cites waterlogged roads and logistical challenges as primary reasons.
normalised: Blueline Courier, a popular delivery service in Delhi, is facing severe delays in several areas due to the recent monsoon. Specifically, deliveries to areas like Sector fifteen, Noida, U-P, two zero one three zero one and Old Delhi, near Jama Masjid, one one zero zero zero six, are experiencing two to three day postponements. The company cites waterlogged roads and logistical challenges as primary reasons.

unnormalised: "We are working tirelessly to ensure all packages reach their destinations as soon as possible," stated a company spokesperson from their Gurgaon headquarters, at Plot 22, Sector 44, Gurugram, Haryana 122003. They further added that extra personnel have been deployed to manage sorting at the main distribution center located at 14/2, Mathura Road, Faridabad, Haryana 121003, to mitigate the impact.
normalised: "We are working tirelessly to ensure all packages reach their destinations as soon as possible," stated a company spokesperson from their Gurgaon headquarters, at Plot twenty two, Sector forty four, Gurugram, Haryana one two two zero zero three. They further added that extra personnel have been deployed to manage sorting at the main distribution center located at fourteen divided by two, Mathura Road, Faridabad, Haryana one two one zero zero three, to mitigate the impact.

unnormalised: Customers are advised to expect delays, especially for deliveries to areas with known flooding issues. The company has also set up a dedicated helpline, +91-9876543210, for inquiries regarding specific deliveries. They anticipate a return to normalcy within the next 48 hrs, assuming no further heavy rainfall.
normalised: Customers are advised to expect delays, especially for deliveries to areas with known flooding issues. The company has also set up a dedicated helpline, plus ninety one dash nine eight seven six five four three two one zero, for inquiries regarding specific deliveries.
